## A chart plotted with plotly

### 19th November, 2016

A box plot depicting the distribution of mpg per transmission type in the `mtcars`  data set.

```{r plotly, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
library(plotly)
mtcars$am <- as.factor(mtcars$am)
transmission <- group_by(mtcars, am)
levels(transmission$am) <- c("automatic", "manual")
plot_ly(transmission, y = transmission$mpg, color = transmission$am, type = "box")
```
